content.question: Which of the following developments in the early nineteenth century could best be used as evidence to support the argument in the second paragraph of the excerpt?

choices.label: The opposition of some political leaders to providing federal funds for public works
The failure of some infrastructure projects to recover their costs
The recruitment of immigrant laborers to work on new transportation projects
The rise of a regional economy based on the production and export of cotton

content.answer: The opposition of some political leaders to providing federal funds for public works
